General.Name: Bonava AB (publ)
General.Description: Bonava AB (publ) operates as a residential developer in Sweden, Germany, Finland, Denmark, Norway, Estonia, Lithuania, St. Petersburg, and Latvia. It provides multi-family, single-family housing, and semi-detached houses units; and develops homes for consumers and investors, such as pension funds, alongside municipalities, and other stakeholders. The company was incorporated in 2013 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

4.Name: Fredrik  Hammarbäck
4.Title: Group Head of Press and Public Affairs
